name: 乔塞林·哈斯

last_movies.title: Assassin's Creed Unity Meets Parkour in Real Life
Je ne suis pas un grand acteur

introduction: JOCELIN HAAS出生于法国巴黎；他是个乒乓球专业。一边学习他的硕士学位的运动学，他发现了一种对魔法的热爱，并开始在各种场合表演。毕业后，他旅行，先住在夏威夷，然后住在加拿大；温哥华蒙特利尔现在多伦多。Jocelin有双重国籍(法国和加拿大)。在魁北克，他在“国立幽默学院”学习单口相声艺术，并且，三年来，制作并表演了自己的一个人表演。在舞台上把他的好奇心从现场喜剧推到了摄像机前表演，然后开始了他的戏剧训练。Jocelin目前在电视和电影领域工作，由Michael Oscars、OAZ Inc .在多伦多和pierre noiseux inc .在蒙特利尔代理。JOCELIN HAAS was born in Paris, France; he was a table tennis professional. While studying his masters degree in Kinesiology, he discovered a love of magic, and began performing live in various venues. After he graduated, he traveled, and lived first in Hawaii, then in Canada; Vancouver, Montreal, and now Toronto. Jocelin has dual citizenship (France & Canada). In Québec, he studied the art of stand-up comedy at "L'École Nationale de l'Humour" and, for three years, produced and performed his own One Man Show. Being on stage pushed his curiosity from live comedy to acting in front of camera and hence began his Drama training. Jocelin is now working in television and film and is represented by Michael Oscars, OAZ Inc in Toronto and Pierre Noiseux Inc. in Montreal.
